title: 776. Live from Radio Row with Bruce Feldman & Elijah Mitchell
itunes:title: 776. Live from Radio Row with Bruce Feldman & Elijah Mitchell
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Rhett Lewis and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks live from Radio Row. To start off, the guys break down the top quarterbacks from the Senior Bowl and East-West Shrine Bowl. Then, the trio look at the top edge rushers at college all-star games. After that, the guys are joined by college football reporter and insider Bruce Feldman, as he discusses his Freaks List, the top college quarterback prospects, Jim Harbaugh, and much more. To wrap up the show, 49ers running back Elijah Mitchell joins, as he talks about the 49ers running scheme, former 49ers offensive coordinator Mike McDaniel, quarterback Trey Lance, and much more.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
